column5: Ruby is a 2016 retro camper available to rent on site. She quaintly exists with the Olivers on their property located in the Schertz/Cibolo/Randolph AFB area. She boasts of Crescent Bend Nature Park as her front yard.  Available: Bicycles Outdoor grill/lighter fluid/charcoal Outdoor speakers and lighting Fire pit/picnic table/recliners/hammocks Giant Jenga/Corn Toss TV/DVD/WI-FI Cookware/utensils/plates/glassware Coffee, snacks and fresh eggs (when available)
column8: Tiny Home living at its best!
